meta.title: WH-JC_Inward_scene
meta.description: Scene for the adaptive tracks when used on the Inward leg of walk (WH-JC)

scenes.name: fixedPlaylistIn
scenes.description: this scene initiates playback of the fixed playlist of music for the leg of the walk that goes from JC to WH. One route initiates the playlist, but after that no other GPS is used until the approach of Wollaton Hall

scenes.name: WollatonHallArrivalMusic
scenes.description: this scene changes to the first layer of Wollaton Hall arrival music when approaching. There are four layers for this arrival music and which come in one by one all stacked togther. Would like a long cross-fade from track6/WaitingForGA into this
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Out'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Out/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArrived'); } }

scenes.name: WollatonHallArrived
scenes.description: This is the final music for arrival at Wollaton Hall, which will continue to loop around as the participants fill in the questionnire. It has two layers, WollatonHallArriveB_Accent' sounds just once (has no repeats set on the track script), whereas 'WollatonHallArriveB_Layer1' loops indefinatley
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track1/WaitingForGA'); } }

scenes.name: track1/WaitingForGA
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'Waiting For GA' when the participnats leave the area around Wollaton hall. It uses 5 waypoints to form 4 routes, which makes for a complex calculation of distance / time. (may change this to a multi-track scene, so different twists and turns of this route are accompanied by different stem arrangements)
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near && !routes['R3'].near && !routes['R4'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('transition'); } else if (waypoints['W5'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length+routes['R3'].length+routes['R4'].length : (routes['R2'].nearest ? waypoints['W3'].distance+routes['R3'].length+routes['R4'].length : (routes['R3'].nearest ? waypoints['W4'].distance+routes['R4'].length : waypoints['W5'].distance)))/1.5; }

scenes.name: transition
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'TheBadGuys' approx half-way along Digby Ave. Only uses 2 waypoint to form 1 route to calcuate walking distance/time

scenes.name: track2/TheBadGuys
scenes.description: this scene transitions track to 'The Bad Guys' when Lime Tree Avenue changes to tree cover
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track3/Stella'); } else if (waypoints['W2'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(waypoints['W2'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track3/Stella
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'Stella' half-way down the Lime Tree Avenue tree cover
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track4/MitaDelMundo'); } else if (waypoints['W2'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(waypoints['W2'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track4/MitaDelMundo
scenes.description: the Mita Del Mundo track commences after walking through the gate on lime tree avenue. There are a set of 4 waypoints and 3 routes, which are currently not needed to calculate the walking distance / time, but rather these are in place as there may be a plan to introduce a multi-track varient, so these routes would then control the volumes of different stems
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track5/SisterCities'); } else if (waypoints['W2'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(waypoints['W2'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track5/SisterCities
scenes.description: the Sister Cities track starts when exiting Lime Tree avenue on to Middleton road It uses 4 waypoints and 3 routes to calculate the walking distance / time. This - as in the outward journey - is a multi-track and some stems are made silent when crossing the pedestrian crossing 'R2
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near && !routes['R3'].near && !routes['R4'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track6/NotAlone'); } else if (waypoints['W5'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length+routes['R3'].length+routes['R4'].length : (routes['R2'].nearest ? waypoints['W3'].distance+routes['R3'].length+routes['R4'].length : (routes['R3'].nearest ? waypoints['W4'].distance+routes['R4'].length : waypoints['W5'].distance)))/1.5; }

scenes.name: track6/NotAlone
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'Not Alone' when entering the jubilee campus sports field. This uses 5 waypoints and 4 routes to calculate the walking distance / time
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near && !routes['R3'].near && !routes['R4'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('AtriumArrival'); } else if (waypoints['W5'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length+routes['R3'].length+routes['R4'].length : (routes['R2'].nearest ? waypoints['W3'].distance+routes['R3'].length+routes['R4'].length : (routes['R3'].nearest ? waypoints['W4'].distance+routes['R4'].length : waypoints['W5'].distance)))/1.5; }

scenes.name: AtriumArrival
scenes.description: this scene changes to the first layer of Atrium arrival music when approaching it
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('AtriumArrived'); }}

scenes.name: AtriumArrived
scenes.description: Final arrival music for completion of the walk
